Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2015, RUE PEEL,5E ETAGE, MONTREAL, Quebec, H3A 1T8, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Theratechnologies Inc is a specialty pharmaceutical company that addresses the unmet medical needs of HIV patients. It mainly operates in Canada and the United States. The company has two approved products, EGRIFTA marketed in Canada and the United States, and Trogarzo approved for commercialization in the United States.

value.name: Christian Marsolais
value.title: Chief Medical Officer & Senior Vice President
